hero.title: Video to Text – Convert videos to text & subtitles instantly
hero.description: Paste a link or upload a file, get a 90-second preview instantly, then unlock the full transcription. Supports YouTube, MP4, MOV, WebM and exports to SRT, TXT, VTT, DOCX formats.
hero.tip: Free 90-second preview • Priority YouTube captions • 24h auto-delete

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.description: Three simple steps to convert your media to text with high accuracy

items.title: Paste link or upload
items.description: Add your video/audio URL or upload a file directly to get started

items.title: Get 90-second preview
items.description: See TXT/SRT preview instantly to verify quality before full processing

items.title: Download full transcription
items.description: Get complete transcription and download in your preferred format

tool_description.title: Video to Text Online
tool_description.description: Our tool supports MP4, MOV, WebM, and AVI video formats. For YouTube videos, we first extract existing captions for instant results (zero processing cost).

items.title: YouTube Caption Priority
items.description: We first extract existing captions for instant results (zero processing cost). When no captions exist, our AI transcription engine processes the audio track automatically.

items.title: Multiple Export Formats
items.description: Export your transcripts as SRT subtitle files with precise timestamps, plain TXT for easy editing, VTT for web players, or formatted DOCX documents.

items.title: Professional Use Cases
items.description: Perfect for content creators, educators, and accessibility compliance. Note: Age-restricted or region-locked videos may require direct file upload.

export_formats.title: Export Formats
export_formats.description: Choose from multiple output formats to suit your workflow and requirements

items.title: Plain Text (TXT)
items.description: Simple text format without timestamps

items.title: SubRip (SRT)
items.description: Subtitle format with precise timestamps

items.title: WebVTT (VTT)
items.description: Web video text tracks format

items.title: Word Document (DOCX)
items.description: Formatted document with styling

items.title: Markdown (MD)
items.description: Structured text with formatting

items.title: JSON
items.description: Structured data with timestamps

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Video to Text FAQ
faq.description: Common questions about video transcription and our service

items.title: How to convert video to text online?
items.description: Simply paste a YouTube link or upload your MP4/MOV/WebM file. We'll provide a 90-second preview instantly, then you can unlock the full transcription with timestamps and export in multiple formats.

items.title: Can I paste a YouTube link to get SRT subtitles?
items.description: Yes! We first extract existing YouTube captions (instant results), and if none exist, we'll transcribe the audio automatically. Both methods produce SRT files with accurate timestamps.

items.title: What video formats are supported?
items.description: We support MP4, MOV, WebM, and AVI files. For online videos, YouTube links work best. Most common video codecs are automatically handled.

items.title: What if my video has no captions?
items.description: No problem! Our AI transcription will process the audio track and generate accurate subtitles with timestamps. The 90-second preview lets you verify quality before full processing.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: Source videos are automatically deleted after 24 hours. Generated transcripts are stored for 7-30 days (configurable), and you can manually delete them anytime. All files are stored securely with encryption.
